com.jidesoft.plaf.xerto
Class XertoMetalUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeelExtension
      com.jidesoft.plaf.vsnet.VsnetLookAndFeelExtension
          com.jidesoft.plaf.xerto.XertoMetalUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
LookAndFeelExtension, ProductNames
public class XertoMetalUtils
extends VsnetLookAndFeelExtension

Initialize the uiClassID to BasicComponentUI mapping for JIDE components using Xerto style for MetalLookAndFeel. Xerto Style is designed by Xerto at http://www.xerto.com.
